location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Andrew Richard Scoble, Baroda to Sir Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Brief letter regarding the dangers of using witnesses who have been 'exposed to temptation' by friends of the Gaekwar (His Highness Malharrao), and that as such witnesses are not required to prove the case asking Pelly's permission to only call those witnesses necessary as proof in support of the various documents being refuted by Damodhur Punt.
